titles.title: A bill to reopen the base membership roll of the Pascua Yaqui Indian Tribe of Arizona.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to reopen for two years the base membership roll of the Pascua Yaqui Indian Tribe of Arizona and to provide notice of such action. Sets forth eligibility requirements for membership.
